Lending Club

Access the Lending Club API

The LendingClub package is a set of functions that enables you to work with your LendingClub account from R. The package contains tools for:

  1. Account management such as viewing the account balance
  2. Transfer funds in our out of the account
  3. Transact on your account by buying or selling notes

Usage

To use this package, you’ll first need to create a credential from your account number and API key. This credential can be saved to the global environment and the other functions will detect it. Use the MakeCredential() function and pass it your investorID number and your API key. You can find the InvestorID on your account summary page and the API key on the Account Settings page.
